fulltext:
Dung Pham Trung
Personal Information
Date of Birth
Oct 26th, 1993
Gender Male
Nationality Vietnam
Github https://github.com/RockyMeadow
Education
2015-2016
Conducting Graduation Thesis, School of Information and Communication and Tech-
nology, Hanoi University of Science and Technology, Hanoi.
Instructor: Associate Professor Van K. Nguyen
Topic: Developing simulation software for Interconnection Network: A framework
for supporting benchmarks
Research in: Distributed Computing and Network Modeling
2011–2016
Bachelor of Computer Science, School of Information and Communication Technology,
Hanoi University of Science and Technology, Hanoi.
ICT Program: An advanced program organized by School of Information and Communica-
tion Technology - HUST; the curriculum is conducted in English.
CPA: 2.81
Most recent GPA: 3.24
Experience
Vocational activities
3/2014– 2/2015
Programming Intern, PFS – FPT Information System, Hanoi.
Working as a part-time programmer. Details:
o Project: Tax Management System
o Learned about Oracle DBMS and Oracle Form Builder to create Tax Form and manage
changes and update in tax-payer, tax submission forms records in database structure.
o Implement system updates in tax departments.
8/2015– 2/2016
Attendant, SoICT & LINAGORA, Hanoi.
Participated in the OPEN UP training program organized by Linagora . The curriculum
focused on the following areas:
o Linux System Administration
o Open Source IT Infrastructure
o Web Development
6/2016– present
Fullstack JavaScript Developer, LINAGORA, Hanoi.
Project: Hublin, an open source WebRTC video conferencing application
1/3
o Involved in maintaining the service. The application utilizes easyRTC as the WebRTC
implementation and AngularJS for the application framework
o Experiment with other WebRTC implementations as alternative solution for easyRTC
Project: OpenPaaS, an open source collaborative platform.
https://github.com/linagora/openpaas-esn
o Involved in maintaining the platform, developing new features/modules.
o Technical stack used for the project:
- In backend: NodeJS for platform backend, PHP (Sabre.io) for the DAV resources server,
MongoDB for database manangement system, ElasticSerach for search engine.
- In frontend: AngularJS and VueJS for web application framework.
o Worked with the JMAP protocol for web mail client
o Integrated third party services to the platform: LinShare for ﬁle sharing, OnlyOﬃce for
document editing
Academic Activities
11/2014– 4/2015
Attendant, Korean Advanced Institute of Science and Technology and HUST, Hanoi.
"ICT/Software Experts Training" course. Certiﬁed
2/2015– Present
Research Student, Software Engineering and Distributed Computing Lab, HUST, Hanoi.
Project: HiTIN, Highly-eﬃcient topologies for interconnection networks with applications
in high-performance computers, computing grids and data centers
Achievements & Honors
11/2014– 4/2015
Certiﬁcate of Completion, ICT/SW Expert Training Course, Korea Advanced Institute
of Science and Technology (Korea), Hanoi.
1/2015
Certiﬁcate of Participation, Starting-up a Knowledge Intensive Business, University of
Turku (Finland), Hanoi.
2011, 2012,
2015
University Scholarship, for excellent achievement in academic year: 2011–2012 Hanoi
University Of Science and Technology, Hanoi.
Extracurricular Activities
11/2014 Assistant, LOTUS+ program Kick-Oﬀ meeting, Hanoi University of Science and Tech-
nology.
2011-2014
Organizing Executive JastenLife - a non proﬁt charity organization with the main ob-
jective is to share and help people with diﬃculty in life throughout Vietnam Hanoi.
2011–2012 Volunteer,
Student Volunteer Club, School of Information and Technology , Hanoi
University of Science and Technology, Hanoi.
Technical skills
Programming languages
PHP(basic understanding), JavaScript, Python
Web application
AngularJS, VueJS
DBMS
MongoDB, Redis, MySQL
VCS git
CI/CD
Gitlab CI/CD, Jenkins
2/3
Container Docker
OS
Linux (Debian-based distros)
Languages
Vietnamese Mothertongue
French
Elementary
Basic words and phrases only
English Advanced
Fluent in communicative and academic aspect. HUST Institutional TOEIC: 925/990
(1/2016)
3/3
